channel.title: Cluster Agent on MyDev - Andre Marcelo-Tanner
channel.description: Recent content in Cluster Agent on MyDev - Andre Marcelo-Tanner

item.title: DataDog: RabbitMQ Cluster Checks using Cluster Agent
item.description: DataDog is a great service for monitoring all your services running on your servers. You typically use it by setting up the DataDog Agent on all your servers and configuring it with what applications/integrations you want it to run checks on. What about external services that do not run on your servers like a managed MySQL or RabbitMQ?
